text: Star Alliance is the world's first and largest airline alliance. Its headquarters are in Frankfurt, Hesse, Germany. It was founded in 1999 by five airlines: Scandinavian Airlines, Thai Airways International, Air Canada, Lufthansa, and United Airlines. Varig Brazilian Airlines was the first airline to join, in 1997. In 2013, the alliance now has 28 member airlines with more than 21,100 daily departures combined. These flights fly to 1,329 airports in more than 150 countries, carrying 678.7 million passengers. ==Members== Member airline Joined Aegean Airlines Air Canada Air China Air New Zealand All Nippon Airways Asiana Airlines Austrian Airlines Avianca Brussels Airlines Copa Airlines Croatia Airlines EgyptAir Ethiopian Airlines EVA Air LOT Polish Airlines Lufthansa Scandinavian Airlines Shenzhen Airlines Singapore Airlines South African Airways Swiss International Air Lines TAM Airlines TAP Portugal Thai Airways International Turkish Airlines United Airlines US Airways Founding member. Left alliance on 30 March 2014 and moved to Oneworld with LAN Airlines. Left alliance in early 2014 upon completion of merger with American Airlines. ==Past members== * Adria Airways * Ansett Australia * bmi * Continental Airlines * Mexicana de Aviacion * Spanair * TACA Airlines * TAM Airlines * US Airways * Varig Brazilian Airlines ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Companies based in Frankfurt Category:1997 establishments in Germany
title: Star Alliance
